errors.message: RuleCode 'ADMIN' appears multiple times in the import
errors.suggestion: Ensure all RuleCode values are unique. Consider using 'ADMIN1', 'ADMIN2' for variations.

errors.message: RuleCode 'POSITION001' exceeds maximum length of 6 characters
errors.suggestion: Shorten RuleCode to 6 characters or less. Example: 'POS001'
